column1: The HP 17.3" Laptop PC is thoughtfully designed. Experience reliable performance with an Intel® Processor[1]

column2: and plenty of storage. We’ve got your back with a 17.3" screen with narrow bezels

column1: enlarged clickpad and a lift-hinge design. Plus
it’s EPEAT® Gold registered[2] and ENERGY STAR® certified and contains post-consumer recycled plastics[3].
